alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 6:26PM EDT until July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAVIDSON AND SOUTHWESTERN RANDOLPH COUNTIES... At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was between Denton and High Rock Lake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Denton, Newsom, Gordontown, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, Nc Wildlife Access Boat Launch, High Rock Lake Marina & Campground, Martha, High Rock Lake and High Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
